approve(address,uint256).details: The zero address indicates there is no approved address.      Throws unless `msg.sender` is the current NFT owner, or an authorized      operator of the current owner.

balanceOf(address).details: NFTs assigned to the zero address are considered invalid, and this      function throws for queries about the zero address.

params._owner: An address for whom to query the balance

returns._0: The number of NFTs owned by `_owner`, possibly zero

params._accessControls: core contract for managing access and roles
params._platform: address of the Hashtag protocol core account

getApproved(uint256).details: Throws if `_tokenId` is not a valid NFT.

params._tokenId: The NFT to find the approved address for

returns._0: The approved address for this NFT, or the zero address if there is none

returns._owner: Address of the owner of the hashtag

params._operator: The address that acts on behalf of the owner
params._owner: The address that owns the NFTs

returns._0: True if `_operator` is an approved operator for `_owner`, false otherwise

params._creator: Address of the account to be attributed with creation
params._hashtag: String version of the hashtag to mint
params._publisher: Address of the publisher through which the hashtag is being created

ownerOf(uint256).details: NFTs assigned to zero address are considered invalid, and queries      about them do throw.

returns._0: The address of the owner of the NFT

recycleHashtag(uint256).details: Token must exist, be not already be owned by platform and time of TX must be greater than lastTransferTime

params._tokenId: The identifier for the hashtag being recycled

renewHashtag(uint256).details: Can only be called by token owner

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: This works identically to the other function with an extra data parameter,      except this function just sets data to "".

params._from: The current owner of the NFT

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Throws unless `msg.sender` is the current owner, an authorized      operator, or the approved address for this NFT. Throws if `_from` is      not the current owner. Throws if `_to` is the zero address. Throws if      `_tokenId` is not a valid NFT. When transfer is complete, this function      checks if `_to` is a smart contract (code size > 0). If so, it calls      `onERC721Received` on `_to` and throws if the return value is not      `bytes4(keccak256("onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)"))`.

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`
params._from: The current owner of the NFT

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Emits the ApprovalForAll event. The contract MUST allow      multiple operators per owner.

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators

params._ownershipTermLength: New length in unix epoch seconds

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

returns._0: token URI of the token, if exists

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Throws unless `msg.sender` is the current owner, an authorized      operator, or the approved address for this NFT. Throws if `_from` is      not the current owner. Throws if `_to` is the zero address. Throws if      `_tokenId` is not a valid NFT.

params._from: The current owner of the NFT

params._accessControls: Address of the access controls contract

approve(address,uint256).notice: Change or reaffirm the approved address for an NFT

balanceOf(address).notice: Count all NFTs assigned to an owner

baseURI().notice: baseURI for looking up up tokenURI for a token

methods.constructor: Constructs the smart contract with access controls and platform address

getApproved(uint256).notice: Get the approved address for a single NFT

getPaymentAddresses(uint256).notice: Returns the commission addresses related to a token

hashtagToTokenId(string).notice: lookup of (lowercase) Hashtag string to token ID

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Query if an address is an authorized operator for another address

mint(string,address,address).notice: Method that a publisher can call to create a hashtag

ownerOf(uint256).notice: Find the owner of an NFT

ownershipTermLength().notice: minimum time in seconds that a hashtag is owned

recycleHashtag(uint256).notice: Recycling a hashtag i.e. transferring ownership back to the platform due to stale ownership

renewHashtag(uint256).notice: Renews a hash tag by setting its last transfer time to be now

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Transfers the ownership of an NFT from one address to another address
Transfers the ownership of an NFT from one address to another address

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage         all of `msg.sender`'s assets

setBaseURI(string).notice: Admin method for updating the base token URI of a hashtag

setHashtagMaxStringLength(uint256).notice: Admin method for updating the max string length of a hashtag

setOwnershipTermLength(uint256).notice: Admin method for updating the ownership length for all hashtag tokens i.e. a global param

setPlatform(address).notice: Admin functionality for updating the address that receives the commission on behalf of the platform

tokenIdToHashtag(uint256).notice: lookup of Hashtag info from token ID

tokenIdToLastTransferTime(uint256).notice: Last time a token was interacted with

tokenPointer().notice: current tip of the hashtag tokens (and total supply) as minted consecutively

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer ownership of an NFT -- THE CALLER IS RESPONSIBLE         TO CONFIRM THAT `_to` IS CAPABLE OF RECEIVING NFTS OR ELSE         THEY MAY BE PERMANENTLY LOST

updateAccessControls(address).notice: Admin functionality for updating the access controls

userdoc.notice: Core smart contract of the protocol that governs the creation of hashtag tokens
